text.name: Is it You?!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP on self

text.name: Is it You?!
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP on self

text.name: Is it You?!
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP on self
<style="highlight">- At max SP, gain Clash Power +1 instead

text.name: Payback with Interest
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 3) Offense Level (max 2, rounded down)
coinDescs: At 4+ Reson. that includes this Skill, deal +10% damage

text.name: Payback with Interest
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / <style="highlight">2) Offense Level (max <style="highlight">3, rounded down)
coinDescs: At 4+ Reson. that includes this Skill, deal <style="highlight">+15% damage

text.name: Payback with Interest
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
<style="highlight">- If the said Reson. includes an A-Reson., double the Offense Level gained from the above effect
coinDescs: At <style="highlight">3+ Reson. that includes this Skill, deal <style="highlight">+20% damage

text.name: Write 'em all down
text.desc:
Deal +1% damage for every 2 [VengeanceBookSinclair] (max 15%)
If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
coinDescs: Deal +2.5% damage for every Reson. that includes this Skill (max 15%)

text.name: Write 'em all down
text.desc:
Deal +1% damage for every <style="highlight">1 [VengeanceBookSinclair] (max <style="highlight">30%)
<style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[StartBattle] This Skill gains (highest Reson. / 2) Offense Level (max 3, rounded down)
<style="highlight">- If the said Reson. includes an A-Reson., double the Offense Level gained from the above effect
coinDescs: Deal <style="highlight">+5% damage for every Reson. that includes this Skill (max <style="highlight">30%)

1101201.name: The Middle Never Forgets
1101201.desc:
When hit by an enemy, inflict 3 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn)

When an other ally is hit by an enemy, inflict 2 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn per Identity)

After Attacking with Base Attack Skills or Counter Skills, consume all [VendettaMark] on the target
- Every time the target consumes [VendettaMark], gain [VengeanceBookSinclair] equal to the amount consumed

1101211.name: The Middle Never Forgets
1101211.desc:
When hit by an enemy, inflict <style="highlight">5</style> [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn)

When an other ally is hit by an enemy, inflict 2 [VendettaMark] against the attacker(or Part) (once per turn per Identity)
<style="highlight">- If the said ally is from the Middle, inflict 3 additional [VendettaMark]</style>

After Attacking with Base Attack Skills or Counter Skills, consume all [VendettaMark] on the target
- Every time the target consumes [VendettaMark], gain [VengeanceBookSinclair] equal to the amount consumed

1101221.name: We've Got Your Back
1101221.desc: Combat Start: 1 ally with the least current HP percentage gains 2 [DefenseUp]

1101231.name: We've Got Your Back
1101231.desc:
Combat Start: 1 ally with the least current HP percentage gains 2 [DefenseUp]
<style="highlight">- If the said ally is from the Middle, also gain 2 [AttackUp]</style>
